alert.note: Alert for Clackamas; Marion (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 9:56AM PST until January 09 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Pudding River at Aurora affecting Clackamas and Marion Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pudding River at Aurora. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Above 22.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low-lying agricultural lands and access roads along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM PST Tuesday the stage was 18.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday afternoon and continue rising to around 23.0 feet early Friday morning. The river is expected to remain above flood stage through Sunday. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 7 AM PST Wednesday.
